content.en: Caching optimization: Researchers have been investigating ways to improve the performance of caching in networks. They have developed algorithms that can optimize caching gain, reduce redundancy, improve routing efficiency, and enhance cache utilization. These algorithms aim to make content delivery faster and more efficient, ultimately benefiting users by reducing network delay and improving content distribution.
content.da: Caching-optimering: Forskere har undersøgt måder at forbedre cachingens ydeevne i netværk på. De har udviklet algoritmer, der kan optimere cachinggevinsten, reducere redundans, forbedre routingeffektiviteten og øge cacheudnyttelsen. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at gøre indholdslevering hurtigere og mere effektiv, hvilket i sidste ende gavner brugerne ved at reducere netværksforsinkelse og forbedre indholdsdistributionen.
